comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: abcde2018 on October 30, 2022, 02:46:46 PMAny Suggestions / Tips to find and narrow down some good bounties ? pro tips  .Check the project itself, there's no short cut on it. comments.author: AzamNurWahid
comments.body: It's good to find a good bounty for now because of several factors at this time including the price of the coin which is still not stable.  But instead of being confused to find a good campaign, it's better to just follow the campaign that is followed by users who have good ratings such as Hero and legendary.  Because they are more thorough in looking for bounty campaigns

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: You shall go only to the bounty section and the only one thing that would become good trick to get the good bounty and that's the reward must be escrowed to make sure the bounty would not be a scam bounty. Any non escrow bounty is not worth to participated caused by the dev can do the shady things anytime. This has become the main concern by so many participants in the bounty sections. that's why mostly of managers are doing escrow right now.

comments.author: Odusko
comments.body: We have few managers in this forum who only accept legit project bounties and they have constantly delivered thi is so because they take they time to research ad get the necessary information about the project before accpeting to run their bounty here.But even at that, you are always advised to do your own personal reseach to build your conviction on the project because even the most experienced manager get fooled sometime by scam teams, so bounty is like gambling ot depend on luck to discover the legit one.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: Quote from: crunck on October 31, 2022, 11:24:35 AMQuote from: Scripture on October 30, 2022, 11:37:02 PMQuote from: abcde2018 on October 30, 2022, 02:46:46 PMAny Suggestions / Tips to find and narrow down some good bounties ? pro tips  . and one more thing. how to find out the bounty campaign from another user's signaturemany thanks!!Look for their road map, ask for their future plans and know if the team behind it is legit because most of the time, they are not real and a scam project only. Go to bounty section, you see a lot of good campaign there but remember that there’s no guarantee profit in bounty, you can try to participate on signature campaign that pays in BTC, also on a project with escrow they are guaranteed.Can you tell me what hot bounty campaign is going on?, I think the bounty campaign is dead because the ICO is no more. Today potential projects they no longer use bounty campaigns as a means of marketing, it is not effective. Currently, most bounty campaigns are junk and non-potential projects, so they can't raise capital from VCs, so they force them to look for free forms of marketing.Bounty campaigns are there to serve as a promotion to the project. Even if ICO method is not being widely use today compared before, There are some new bounty project who are surviving even without VC help, A Project team who are really serious about the project will do a thing to accumulate some funds to the community to continue their development. Though I agree to you that the majority of bounty project doesn't really have a potential if you see deep through it. We all can agree that today a bounty campaign that offers reward with value is better than a bounty project that offer their own token reward that commonly don't have any value.

comments.author: super bako
comments.body: If you want to get a good bounty, I think you should follow the bountydetective manager. there are a lot of good but the participants limit and allocation is appropriate, and to find out the good project is not easy. partner.team is clear. road maps and having these investors are usually good to follow.

comments.author: irhact
comments.body: Quote from: abcde2018 on October 30, 2022, 02:46:46 PMAny Suggestions / Tips to find and narrow down some good bounties ? pro tips  . and one more thing. how to find out the bounty campaign from another user's signaturemany thanks!!Just visit the bounty section and search the project name you saw on the users signature and you'll get the campaign. To get a better campaign, you just have to be lucky as those who are good campaign when launch gets plenty participants and you won't get good payment. Those that have benefits the most from bounty are those who joined campaign not many people enroll to promote and later the campaign became successful.The good manager that launch good campaign don't give very high reward because many hunters are also following those manager to join their campaign. Just sperate your reach to as many campaign as possible and one will give you a good pay.

comments.author: nurilham
comments.body: This topic was already discussed many times, try to use 'Search feature' to find out them.There are no exact ways to guarantee good bounties. But you can try analyzing the projects deeply and choose the bounties handled by trusted bounty managers only. If you find negative issues about the projects, it is a sign to avoid joining the bounties. You also don't join any bounty managed by bad bounty managers, you may never get the bounty payments. There are some bounty managers with bad reputations, kindly ignore them.In addition, to find a legit bounty or a legit signature campaign, the Service board is a recommended place : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0The Altcoin Discussion board seems a more proper place for this topic. Move this thread to https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=67.0

comments.author: Captain Corporate
comments.body: My best suggestion; don't. I agree with most people that Bounties are not a way of making money, they just give you money that they created, something that worths absolutely nothing, and they ask you to work for them and if all of us work for them for their made up money, then they would maaaaybe have a token that worths something, and we would earn.So in logic, we are the ones that made it worth something, not them, and they are paying us for what we did, when in fact we should be the ones who get it all, because it was our work that turned it into valuable thing. Otherwise all of their work prior to our bounty hunting would have worth zero anyway. So know your worth, and do not spend your time on bounties and just focus on things that actually have value, it would make you money for sure.

comments.author: TheGreatPython
comments.body: Quote from: S A KHAIR on October 30, 2022, 11:20:14 PMParticipating in bounty campaigns of famous managers only helps you increase your chances of receiving rewards, but does not guarantee that the project is good, the project will still become a garbage project as usual. But honestly, the projects in the bounty campaign are mostly junk, they can't even be listed on the exchange or will be dumped shortly after and disappear. I haven't seen any good or potential projects in the bounty board.I think the best sure way is when the reputable manager do also escrow the funds. As long as the manager and the escrow doesn't turn into a scam then you guys can expect to get your rewards as soon as the contract is over. If some of the projects can do this then why not the others right? Although there are still legit projects who can pay even without an escrow and even if it's only managed by some newbie/unreputable managers.If you are scared about the future of the tokens then don't apply bounty which pays their own token but choose the one that pays in stable coins instead or pays with top altcoins. There are lots of them nowadays.
